title: Simulation-Based Team Communication Training in Obstetrics and Gynecology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and patient care procedures
context.additional_context: Team-based role-playing in a simulation environment utilizing digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can apply standardized protocols in obstetric emergency situations with 90% accuracy
Can apply the SBAR technique (Situation-Background-Assessment-Recommendation) to real-world cases for effective team communication
Can repeatedly train decision-making processes in response to patient condition changes at least three times in digital simulation environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
